subject: Re: Order #SSN4904 confirmed
description_text:
Hello,

can you tell me when the Hs Pro Shifter will be shipped? On your site you stated 19th December (before it was even sooner). Would be glad to get some info.

Thank you
J. Weber
Von meinem iPhone gesendet

> Am 15.12.2025 um 23:48 schrieb SIMSONN <service@simsonn.com>:
> 
> Simsonn HS Pro Shifter the H/SQ Dual-Mode Racing Simulation Shifter ×

conversations.body_text: 你好，约翰内斯·韦伯， 您好，货物将于本周陆续发出。由此给您带来的不便，我们深表歉意。
